attributes.action: retain and support ALL faith schools which adhere to and teach the Christian heritage of our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adherence to and the practise of the Christian faith by our forbears has made our country great in the past.   It has provided a moral standard against which the actions of all of us can be judged & all our laws have been based on this approach. If we cease to teach & uphold this then we quickly arrive at a position where ALL values become relative, and anyone can do anything provided they can get away with it.
